posts.title: How I made an automated dynamic avatar for my Bluesky profile
posts.author: Dame
posts.excerpt: Several years ago, back when Twitter was a thing and it had a decent API, my friend @goose.art did a weird little experiment where he made his avatar dynamic... it automatically changed appearances on a regular basis and became increasingly deep-fried (increased in distortion and lossy compression).
